title: Concordia
tagline: Build a trading empire to become the master of the mediterranean in this game of beautifully interlocking, generous systems.
good: An offering of multiple good choices, every turn.
Deep gameplay that moves faster than many light games.
Many simple systems which are elegantly interwoven to make something far greater than the sum of it's parts.
bad: The astonishingly generic theme isn't something you can just ignore.
